title: HOUR 1 - Gronk, Kyrie, NBA draft, Browns
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Gronk, Kyrie, NBA draft, Browns
description:
Looking at the career of Rob Gronkowski

Kyrie Irving isn't reliable but he might work out for the Lakers

Thoughts on the NBA draft

The Browns look like a 4th place team


Guest: Bruce Pearl
